content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 2, Valencia 2.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 2, Valencia 2.

Substitution, Valencia. Antonio Barragán replaces Eduardo Vargas.
Attempt missed. Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Marcelo with a cross.
